snippet: Hydraulic fracturing is creating competition for water and threatening its contamination in a part of the state where oilmen and farmers have coexisted peacefully for decades.
abstract: Hydraulic fracturing is creating competition for water and threatening its contamination in parts of California where oilmen and farmers have coexisted peacefully for decades; oil companies are increasingly moving into agricultural areas that also have huge untapped oil reserves.
lead_paragraph: Hydraulic fracturing is creating competition for water and threatening its contamination in a part of the state where oilmen and farmers have coexisted peacefully for decades.

headline.seo: California ‘Oil and Ag’ Face Rift on Fracking
headline.main: Fracking Tests Ties Between California ‘Oil and Ag’ Interests
headline.print_headline: Fracking Tests Ties Between California ‘Oil and Ag’ Interests
